item.title: Interaction Design
item.description: Taking an online course on Introduction to Human Centered Design and Introduction to Design Principles by University of California, San Diego on Coursera.

item.title: Stanford Human-Computer Interaction Group
item.description: Making research more accessible by collaborating globally to learn and create short talks on influential papers | Collaboratively creating courses to be published on the Stanford Platform.

item.title: Reinforcement Learning with Deep-Q Learning
item.description: Training a neural network to play the Atari standard Arcade Games using only the visual frame buffer as an input.

item.title: PMO Mobile App Contest
item.description: Participating in the nationwide contest to create the official Prime Minister's Office Application.

item.title: Intern at IIT
item.description: Media Lab intern at Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur.
